amendment.description: To require aliens to make an oath prior to receiving a nonimmigrant visa.

action.text: Amendment SA 3928 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3928.
Amendment SA 3928 proposed by Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S10239-10242; text: CR S10239) To require aliens to make an oath prior to receiving a nonimmigrant visa.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3928 proposed by Senator Sessions.
